name: phony
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not sincere or not real: All salespeople seem to have the same phony smile. He gave the police a phony address. Synonyms
bogus
fake
false (NOT TRUE)

Add to word list
Add to word list
represented as real but actually false; intended to deceive: They were accused of submitting phony claims to insurers, including Medicare.
a person who falsely pretends to be something: I think he’s a phony.
